title: Assault On Utopia: Part 1
description: 500 Years in the future, an Idealistic society comes under threat from an unexplained source. A period of extended peace has left them weak and vulnerable. Only a select few people have the skills required to save mankind.Senator Peter James, acclaimed scientific genius, must bring his considerable resources to bear on this new threat. His team? A disgraced pilot, a withdrawn scientist, a warrior without a war and a soldier with a vendetta.Can this unlikely group come together to form the team necessary to save the day?Explore the first ten full chapters of this gripping upcoming novel from Steven P Sharp
author: Steven P Sharp
